item.title: [Publication] Exploring Spatio-Temporal Representations by Integrating Attention-based Bidirectional-LSTM-RNNs and FCNs for Speech Emotion Recognition
[Award] National third award on 2017 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 6%)
item.description: This contest is held by Zhejiang University and Apple, Inc to all students over the great China area.

item.title: [Project] Depression Detection Software Based on Speech and Tune
item.description: 2017 Tianjin Province level National Undergraduate Training Programs for Innovation and Entrepreneurship.

item.title: [Award] National third award on 2016 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 10%)
item.description: This contest is held by Zhejiang University and Apple, Inc to all students over the great China area.

I am a senior undergaduate software engineeering student at Tianjin Normal University, Tianjin, China. I am a key member of the Cognitive and Affective Computing Lab at my TJNU, advised by Prof. Ziping Zhao. I am also a former Baidu FE intern at DuerOS department, Baidu, Inc. My mentor is Sen Li and Yangyang Zhang, they are smart and respectful engineers. My research at TJNU is about applied machine learning and affective computing.
